resources.string:
My Name is Mr. Keats!
I like to Solve Real World Challenging problem.
Coding is my passion, 
I like to break and build the stuff via coding!
Apart from that, I like to travel,specially long trips. 
My favourite Cartoon is Ben Ten and Joker movie is one of best movie i have seen so far! well I also like to play cricket and badminton as outdoor game!
I also believe in spirituality! I love wandering at a place where land are full of trees and surrounded by mountains!
